result.reason: Users must currently create a PuTTY session externally just to use an SSH private key; adding an SSHPrivateKeyPath property on the connection object would allow specifying the key file directly in mRemoteNG's connection settings.
result.approach: Add an SSHPrivateKeyPath string property to AbstractConnectionRecord (following SSHOptions/PuttySession pattern), wire it into ConnectionInfoInheritance, then in PuttyBase.Connect() pass '-i <path>' to PuTTY when the property is set, and update XML/CSV serializers.
